'''High Priest Hati''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|The Magranite priest has the build of a boulder. His thickset frame stretches his fine robes at the seams.

He regards you with a steady, calm gaze, nodding in greeting.}}
Hati is a devoted worshiper of Magran, as can be expected from her head priest. He chose the open-air temple in order to benefit from exposure: Wind and rain are perfect trials for a follower of a goddess that believes in perseverance and overcoming obstacles.

}}

## =Quests

=
* [Her Last Request](/herLastRequest/): He refuses to allow you to cremate [Muhai](/muhai/)'s body in Magran's Fire.

==Background==
{{Description|The Magranite priest has the build of a boulder. His thickset frame stretches his fine robes at the seams.

He regards you with a steady, calm gaze, nodding in greeting.}}
Hati is a devoted worshiper of Magran, as can be expected from her head priest. He chose the open-air temple in order to benefit from exposure: Wind and rain are perfect trials for a follower of a goddess that believes in perseverance and overcoming obstacles.
